name: Mystic Hand

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally HP in Dungeons by 25%.

skills.name: Tainted Blade
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5% Lea stl)

skills.name: Turn the Tide
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Steals 2 random buffs from the target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Soul Link
skills.raw_description:
Heals the ally with the lowest HP by 25%, then equalizes the HP levels of all allies.
Lvl. 2 Heal +5%
Lvl. 3 Heal +5%
Lvl. 4 Heal +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
